languages.text: {n}На лице пленника возникает высокомерная гримаса. Даже в клетке, залитый кровью и лишенный великолепной брони, он взирает на вас с надменным превосходством пост-человека.{/n} "Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы судить о чистоте и скверне Ангела Императора? Моя душа была ободрана до кости ледяными ветрами Врат Моркай, и в ней осталась только преданность Всеотцу и Рассу".

{n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице пленника возникает высокомерная гримаса. Даже в клетке, залитый кровью и лишенный великолепной брони, он взирает на вас с надменным превосходством пост-человека.{/n} "Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы судить о чистоте и скверне Ангела Императора? Моя душа была ободрана до кости ледяными ветрами Врат Моркай, и в ней осталась только преданность Всеотцу и Рассу".

My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

languages.text: {n}他的脸上带着傲慢与不屑的表情。即便他被关在笼子里，浑身是血，失去了华丽的盔甲，他也仍然带着超越人类的傲慢与优越态度，居高临下地盯着你。{/n}“你何德何能？你有什么资格评判帝皇的天使是否纯洁？我的灵魂已经被莫凯之门冰冷的寒风切削得只剩骨头，如今只剩下对全父与鲁斯的忠诚。”
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的脸上带着傲慢与不屑的表情。即便他被关在笼子里，浑身是血，失去了华丽的盔甲，他也仍然带着超越人类的傲慢与优越态度，居高临下地盯着你。{/n}“你何德何能？你有什么资格评判帝皇的天使是否纯洁？我的灵魂已经被莫凯之门冰冷的寒风切削得只剩骨头，如今只剩下对全父与鲁斯的忠诚。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}彼の顔が傲慢な軽蔑の表情で歪んだ。檻に入れられ、血にまみれ、派手な防具を剥ぎ取られても、ポスト・ヒューマンとしての傲慢な優位性を持ってこちらを見下ろしている。{/n}「皇帝の天使に対して純粋だの腐敗だと決めつけやがって何様だ？俺の魂はモルカイの門の凍てつく風によって骨まで削り取られた。この身は全知の父とラスへの忠誠心しか残っていない」
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の顔が傲慢な軽蔑の表情で歪んだ。檻に入れられ、血にまみれ、派手な防具を剥ぎ取られても、ポスト・ヒューマンとしての傲慢な優位性を持ってこちらを見下ろしている。{/n}「皇帝の天使に対して純粋だの腐敗だと決めつけやがって何様だ？俺の魂はモルカイの門の凍てつく風によって骨まで削り取られた。この身は全知の父とラスへの忠誠心しか残っていない」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Su cara se retuerce con altivo desdén. Incluso enjaulado, cubierto de sangre y despojado de su magnífica armadura, te mira con la arrogante superioridad de un ser posthumano.{/n} «¿Y quién es usted para juzgar la pureza o la corrupción de un ángel del Emperador? Mi alma fue desollada por los vientos helados ante la Puerta de Morkai y ahora solo alberga lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas y a Russ».
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cara se retuerce con altivo desdén. Incluso enjaulado, cubierto de sangre y despojado de su magnífica armadura, te mira con la arrogante superioridad de un ser posthumano.{/n} «¿Y quién es usted para juzgar la pureza o la corrupción de un ángel del Emperador? Mi alma fue desollada por los vientos helados ante la Puerta de Morkai y ahora solo alberga lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas y a Russ».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Son visage n'exprime plus que le dédain. Même en cage, couvert de sang et privé de son armure, il vous toise de toute sa supériorité de post-humain.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous pour juger de la pureté ou de la corruption d'un ange de l'Empereur ? Mon âme a été écorchée vive par les vents glaciaux de la Porte de Morkaï et aujourd'hui, tout ce qu'il me reste, c'est ma loyauté au Père de Tous et à Russ. »
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage n'exprime plus que le dédain. Même en cage, couvert de sang et privé de son armure, il vous toise de toute sa supériorité de post-humain.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous pour juger de la pureté ou de la corruption d'un ange de l'Empereur ? Mon âme a été écorchée vive par les vents glaciaux de la Porte de Morkaï et aujourd'hui, tout ce qu'il me reste, c'est ma loyauté au Père de Tous et à Russ. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Sein Gesicht verzieht sich vor hochmütiger Abscheu. Selbst im Käfig, voller Blut und ohne seine prächtige Rüstung, zwingt sein Blick dich mit der arroganten Überlegenheit eines Post-Menschen nieder.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, um über die Reinheit oder Verderbnis eines Engels des Imperators zu richten? Meine Seele wurde von den Eiswinden am Portal des Morkai bis auf die Knochen entblößt, und übrig geblieben ist nichts als Treue zum Allvater und Russ."
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

Selbst im Käfig, voller Blut und ohne seine prächtige Rüstung, zwingt sein Blick dich mit der arroganten Überlegenheit eines Post-Menschen nieder.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, um über die Reinheit oder Verderbnis eines Engels des Imperators zu richten? Meine Seele wurde von den Eiswinden am Portal des Morkai bis auf die Knochen entblößt, und übrig geblieben ist nichts als Treue zum Allvater und Russ."

languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

languages.text: {n}Yüzü, mağrur bir küçümsemeyle bükülüyor. Kafese tıkılmış, kana bulanmış ve ihtişamlı zırhından yoksun kalmış olsa da öte insan üstünlüğüne bürünmüş kibirli bakışlarıyla seni alt ediyor.{/n} "Sen kim oluyorsun da İmparator'un Meleği'nin saflığıyla yozlaşmışlığının muhakemesini yapıyorsun? Benim ruhum, Morkai Geçidi'nin buz gibi rüzgârlarında kemiklerime kadar kazındı. Yücebaba ve Russ'a duyduğum sadakatten başka bir şeyim kalmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}His face twists with haughty disdain. Even caged, covered in blood, and stripped of his magnificent armour, he stares you down with all the arrogant superiority of a post-human.{/n} "Who are you to judge the purity or corruption of an Angel of the Emperor? My soul was flayed to the bone by the icy winds of the Gate of Morkai, and now nothing remains but loyalty to the Allfather and Russ."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü, mağrur bir küçümsemeyle bükülüyor. Kafese tıkılmış, kana bulanmış ve ihtişamlı zırhından yoksun kalmış olsa da seni öte insan üstünlüğüne bürünmüş kibirli bakışlarıyla alt ediyor.{/n} "Sen kim oluyorsun da İmparator'un bir Meleği'nin saflığıyla yozlaşmışlığının muhakemesini yapıyorsun? Benim ruhum, Morkai Geçidi'nin buz gibi rüzgârlarında kemiklerime kadar kazınmış. Şimdiyse salt Yücebaba ve Russ sadakati barındırıyor."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
